languages.text: {n}Подрагивающие уголки губ, напрягшиеся ладони и слегка участившееся дыхание говорят, что дознаватель лжет.{/n}
{n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Подрагивающие уголки губ, напрягшиеся ладони и слегка участившееся дыхание говорят, что дознаватель лжет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The faintly twitching corners of the mouth, the tensed palms, and the slightly quickened breathing point to the Interrogator lying.{/n}
{n}The faintly twitching corners of the mouth, the tensed palms, and the slightly quickened breathing point to the Interrogator lying.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mains d'Heinrix sont crispées, les commissures de ses lèvres tremblent légèrement et sa respiration s'est accélérée. L'attitude de l'interrogateur laisse à penser qu'il ment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains d'Heinrix sont crispées, les commissures de ses lèvres tremblent légèrement et sa respiration s'est accélérée. L'attitude de l'interrogateur laisse à penser qu'il ment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las comisuras de los labios de Heinrix tiemblan levemente, sus manos se tensan y su respiración se acelera. El comportamiento del interrogador sugiere que miente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las comisuras de los labios de Heinrix tiemblan levemente, sus manos se tensan y su respiración se acelera. El comportamiento del interrogador sugiere que miente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希的嘴角微微抽搐，双手非常紧张，呼吸也变得急促起来。这些迹象表明他在说谎。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的嘴角微微抽搐，双手非常紧张，呼吸也变得急促起来。这些迹象表明他在说谎。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの口角がわずかにひきつり、手が緊張し、呼吸が速くなっていった。インテロゲイターの行動は、彼が嘘をついていることを示唆している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの口角がわずかにひきつり、手が緊張し、呼吸が速くなっていった。インテロゲイターの行動は、彼が嘘をついていることを示唆している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Mundwinkel zucken leicht, seine Hände sind angespannt und sein Atem geht schneller. Das Verhalten des Interrogators lässt darauf schließen, dass er lügt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Mundwinkel zucken leicht, seine Hände sind angespannt und sein Atem geht schneller. Das Verhalten des Interrogators lässt darauf schließen, dass er lügt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in dudaklarının köşesi hafifçe seğiriyor, elleri geriliyor ve nefesi hızlanıyor. Sorgucu'nun davranışı yalan söylediğine işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Heinrix's mouth twitch slightly, his hands are tense, and his breathing has quickened. The Interrogator's behaviour suggests that he is lying.{/n}
